title: If i miss one Rakath of Jumuah
transcript: at last Friday when I went to the mosque for praying jum I missed one ra of the jum and I got another ra with the IM is my prayer valid the answer is yes as long as you have managed to pray one raak with the Imam you pray full uh uh afterwards and your J is accepted but if the IM in the second ra said and then you joined him onwards when he gives Salam you have to pray four raas because you've missed the J because you've missed the second ra with him this is missing the J and hence you have to pray and not J again we have
